publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3440 Malcolm Chisholm: Equality Bill - UK Legislationâ€”That the Parliament agrees the principles contained in the provisions of the Equality Bill, including the power to impose duties on public authorities, so far as those provisions relate to matters within the legislative competence of the Scottish Parliament or confer functions on the Scottish Ministers, and agrees that those provisions should be considered by the UK Parliament. Supported by: Johann Lamont*
